11.content: Who do you want to see Ayame torture with her feet?
11.title: Steath Assassin

choices: Kiku likes it. (Asks her for more)
Kiku hates it. (Begs her to stop)
114.content:
Princess Kiku's eyes start to flutter as she begins to wake up. When she comes to, she looks around and funds herself in a small cabin. She tries to get up, but she is unable to. She has her hands tied behind her back. As she squirms around, he captor appears.

"I see you're awake." Ayame said coming out of the shadows. "I was starting to get bored."

"Ayame, what's going on here?" Princess Kiku asked. "Did you kidnap me?"

Princess Kiku couldn't believe her eyes. Her sister kidnapped her. Why would she do this?

"What are you going to do with me?" Princess Kiku asked.

Ayame brushed some of the loose hair behind Kiku's head.

"Shhh, I'm not going to hurt you." Ayame said starting to take off her sandals. "We're going to have some fun. You know, I've been on missions for awhile now. Mission, after mission, I haven't had a lot of time to myself. My feet have been hurting for a while now."

An odor quickly filled the room.

"Kiku, would you do your dear sister a favor?" Ayame asked. "My feet are so hot. I could use a cool sensation on them. Could you help me out? It would mean a lot."

"Um…" Kiku managed to say before Ayame started rubbing her feet on her face.

Ayame's feet are very sweaty and smelly. Her small pudgy toes are rubbing her hair. Kiku with the lack of oxygen, couldn't help but take sniffs of her feet.

"How you doing down there?" Ayame said removing her feet.

"Um…." Kiku said.

Ayame wiggled her toes at Kiku.
114.title: Princess Kiki

12.content: Who do you want to see her torture with her feet?
12.title: Ibuki, on the scene!

choices: Ibuki teases Sakura with her feet
Ibuki make her smell her feet
Ibuki uses her foot bandages first to tease Sakura
122.content:
A young girl in a seifuku was seen waking up after a long while, in an unconscious state to be more specific.

"Ugh... Huh? Where am I?" The young athletic girl is sneakers asked as she noticed that she's in a dojo or sorts, where it seems to be too quiet for comfort.

"Oh! I see you're awake now!" said a mysterious yet cheerful voice.

"Wait, who's there!" Sakura shouted as she suddenly found out that her hands and feet are bound.

"Silly you, it's me, Ibuki! Don't you remember what happened after we fought?" The ninja, oddly wearing her school shoes, asked the tied-up Sakura.

"Oh wait... oh no...." Sakura said immediately as her memory started coming back to her.

"Yes, I think we made a bet that whoever loses the fight is going to be tortured within an hour, since we didn't seem to agree on each other the last time we fought. And look at this, I won!" Ibuki reminded her in a happy tone.

"Wait... what are you going to do to me...?" Sakura worriedly asked.

"Well, I was really thinking about what to do to you for a while, and then I remembered, 'I'm a ninja!', so..." Ibuki said as she proceeded to remove her school shoes, showing her bandaged feet immediately. They fought each other in their trademark outfit, so at the time they fought in the same dojo, she was barefooted.

And then, suddenly, Sakura noticed the bad smell lingering in the air. She tried to hold her nose knowing where it came from.

"Huh? Are you saying that my feet smell? Hey, I just work as hard as you, little Miss Converse!" Ibuki pouted as she placed her shoe next to Sakura's head, knowing she won't be able to get away. Suddenly...
122.title: Sakura and the smell of High School

choices: Ibuki stuffs her sweaty feet bandages into Sakura's mouth.
Ibuki just tapes her mouth shut.
Ibuki finds a dirty sock to use instead.
1222.content:
Suddenly Ibuki places here feet directly on Sakura's face!

Sakura was disgusted, they smelled absolutely horrible! She tried to get out of her bonds but it was useless. "Ugh what are you doing get those things away from me!"

Ibuki just laughed, "A bet was a bet little Sakura and now you get suffer!"

Sakura twisted and turned trying to keep those feet away from her nose. She had a little bit of success by breathing through her mouth but still the air permeated her face and the air around it.

Ibuki shook her head, "Now we can't have that, I want you to sniff with your nose."

Ibuki could use her feet bandages to gag Sakura or she could just tape her mouth shut. What should she do?
1222.title: Ibuki make her smell her feet

choices: Ibuki continues to smother her with her stinky feet
Ibuki makes sure that Sakura doesn't pass out with her stinky socks
12221.content:
"I just got a great idea!" Ibuki exclaimed as she pulled her sweaty, stinky foot bandages off of her feet and put them in Sakura's mouth.
"They're nasty!" Sakura thought to herself as she tasted the sweaty foot bandages while she smelled Ibuki's stinky barefeet.
"They taste good, don't they?" Ibuki said as she continued to rub her stinky barefeet all over Sakura's face. As Sakura tasted Ibuki's sweaty foot bandages and continued to smell Ibuki's feet, her vision begins to fade.

What will happen to poor Sakura now?
12221.title: Ibuki stuffs her sweaty feet bandages into Saku...

choices: Yes she suffers the next 50 minutes horribly though.
122211.content:
Ibuki raises her feet for just a moment.

"Ohh little girl I really hope you don't pass out because if you do I'm just going to keep my feet right on your face to smother you."

Sakura made gagging sounds.

"And you know its only been about ten minutes. That means you'll probably die or maybe if I'm merciful just leave you with brain damage. Hmm brain damage I bet I could damage you so much that I could make you a moronic foot slave for the rest of your life. How does that sound pinky?"

Sakura moaned and writhed trying to escape the horrible smelly foot. She tried to avoid passing out with all of her strength. She didn't want to die! She didn't want to become brain damaged. Tears welled in her eyes both from fear and the hideously toxic smell coming from Ibuki's feet. Can she avoid passing out?
122211.title: Ibuki continues to smother her with her stinky ...

choices: Sakura has experienced some brain damage.
Sakura isn't brain damaged, but she is acting...strangely.
1222112.content:
The cruel kunoichi giggled and kept up her sweaty assault. She was pondering on all the ways she could experiment with her foul peds. Her feet were still firmly stuck onto the school girl's face, they hugged and squeezed onto her cheeks, oozing sweat as they did. As Ibuki thought to herself she her slimy toes played on her forehead. Tapping a quick rhythm that fitted the tune she was humming contently. Every little tap splashed some sweat across the rest of Sakura's face. Then Ibuki frowned.

Sakura, distraught and afraid, was tussling her head from side to side, trying the dodge the wide, cheesy soles. Sakura was still forced to breathe with her nose, absorbing the sharp odors that were slowly bringing her to unconsciousness. But the meager display of resistance was still annoying Ibuki and she did her best to clamp down and squash her face into stinky submission. Having sweaty feet worked to the ninja's disadvantage, and her dripping arches kept slipping away as Sakura tossed and turned. Sakura was beginning to find miniscule pockets of slightly fresher air due to her dodging, but Ibuki put an end to this.

She simply kept her feet in place above Sakura's head. The teenager mindlessly kept tossing and turning, and ended up wiping her nose against the huge smelly soles over and over. The vinegary stench got the better of her, and to her dismay, she passed out. Ibuki laughed out loud and began squishing Sakura's soft face, keeping her dirty toes wiggling on her nose. Sakura kept sniffing, unaware of the damage the smell was doing to her. This was exactly what Ibuki wanted, she couldn't wait to see the results, and if the teenager would lose her IQ and allow her to be trained into "a moronic foot slave".

Forty minutes of unadulterated inhaling left Sakura pale, and she woke up. The kunoichi lifted her feet, and rested them back in a pair of worn out flip-flops. "So my little toe-rag?" She began with a chirp in her voice. "How are we feeling?"
1222112.title: Nope she passes out...

12221122.content: "I... I love your feetttt" Sakura states, sniffing the soles. Kunoichi wiggles her toes and Sakura begins licking them. "How may i serve you? "
12221122.title: Sakura isn't brain damaged, but she is acti...

choices: Put the socks inside the mouth, and cover her mouth with her foot bandages
Put the socks and the foot bandages inside her mouth at the same time
12223.content:
Ibuki decided to making things worse for the vulnerable Street Fighter, who is trying her best not to breathe in any more of her potent ninja foot stink.

"You know, I'm not only a busy ninja, but I'm also a very busy student, so..." Ibuki exclaimed as she proceeded to pick up a pair of her very stinky socks from inside her shoe.

"I forgot to wash my feet for a very long time, but moreso with my socks! Do you wanna know how it tastes like?" Ibuki said to a very worried Sakura.

"LET ME GO!" Sakura said as she accidentally got a whiff of her foot once again, causing her to almost lose consciousness.

"That's gotta mean a yes! But wait, how do I go about it...?" Ibuki wondered as she thought....
12223.title: How to use a pair of socks and foot bandages

choices: Ibuki smothers her with her toes so she takes big wiffs when she inhales.
Ibuki stands on her face making her sniff while being hurt by her feet!
122231.content:
Ibuki stuffed her dirty sweaty socks into poor Sakura's mouth. Sakura tasted the cheesy vinegar tasting socks and nearly threw up in her mouth. She gave out a muffled moan of despair. They tasted just purely awful, nothing so horrible had ever been put in her mouth.

Ibuki quickly took her foot bandages off and used it to to tie the socks in place. She took care to wrap some parts of it on her victim's upper lip right under her nose. That way she would be inhaling the potent foot bandage stench too! Of course that was nothing compared to the main course that was about to come up.

Sakura was absolutely miserable and now when Ibuki brought her feet down on her face she was absolutely helpless. She had to breathe through her nose and that meant inhaling the sweaty feet smell direction from the source! She screamed out a muffled 'please' but that just caused Ibuki to laugh.

"What's that? Can't here you!"

Sakura thought she was going to die when she took her first sniff of those sweat drenched feet. Each breath she took made her more light headed and nauseous. And then Ibuki decided to make things even worse!
122231.title: Put the socks inside the mouth, and cover her m...

choices: Sakura takes a deep breath, and struggles
Sakura takes a deep breath, struggles, and passes out from the stench
1222311.content:
Ibuki felt like making Sakura's life worse than it already is, and decided to use her toes to clamp her nose, not allowing the high schooler to breathe.

Deprived, Sakura was now desperately struggling and was finding a way to keep herself stable in this situation, but to no avail. She had to find a way to keep up.

"You want to breathe, Sakura? Here we go!" Ibuki said as she immediately let go of the toes, with Sakura now fully realizing why she wanted to do that in the first place...
1222311.title: Toe-Trapped

choices: Ibuki waits for her to wake up and then makes her sniff again!  Heartless!
Ibuki is sorry for what she did and asks Sakura to forgive her.
12223112.content:
Sakura was on the verge of passing out so when the toes squeezing her nostrils shut unclenched she immediately drew in a massive breath. The potent foot stench immediately suffused her entire body. The toxicity ran through Sakura like a stampede. She began to twitch and her body went into convulsions. Her body contorted and then went into a full Grand Mal seizure.

Ibuki could only stare in disbelief as Sakura passed out and went into a massive seizure. She couldn't believe her smelly feet were that powerful! The only good thing for Sakura is that she had passed out while her brain went through the seizure.

Ibuki watched for several minutes as Sakura's body went through its involuntary convulsions. She could really do some permanent damage to Sakura if she wasn't careful. Of course that could be fun...
12223112.title: Sakura takes a deep breath, struggles, and pass...

choices: The smell wakes up Sakura, and...
Ibuki calmly waited for Sakura to wake up
122231121.content:
As Ibuki watched Sakura in her passed out state, she was in a state of disbelief and amazement.

The kunoichi realized after torturing Sakura with her powerful foot odor that it was definitely more powerful than her usual abilities, including her Hashinsho! Not even that move could make anyone knocked out in such a satisfying and dominating manner. Sakura was in a mess, still having the sweaty sock in her mouth and her awful smelling foot wraps covering the mouth, but still having the smell of it reach the nose. The only fortunate thing in all of this is that Sakura had a reprieve of a few moments before she can get back to her senses.

Ibuki felt she should apologize, but knew that it was a part of a deal. But for the sake of curiosity, she decided to take Sakura's shoes and socks off, and sniffed her shoe a bit. Ibuki immediately recoiled, realizing that her feet also smells as bad, thanks to her hyperactive nature and her shoes.

But still, Ibuki's feet can do that to Sakura?

"That's it! It's official: foot odor is a true skill!"

And with that point made by Ibuki, she planted her feet on Sakura, waiting for her to wake up, but not before pulling a joke on Sakura. Ibuki equipped her own stinky shoes on Sakura's feet, and will wait for how she'll react to it.
122231121.title: Ninja Feet: The Ultimate Weapon

choices: Hears why she made her wear Ibuki's shoes
Tries her best to get away, but Ibuki punishes her for that
1222311211.content:
Ibuki noticed that Sakura was beginning to bring her senses back after being assaulted by her foot odor, ironically, being woken up by the very same smell that knocked her out. Immediately, Sakura realizes that she was unable to survive being conscious after being exposed to so much foot stink, that she had unconsciously given up and passed out right then and there.

The kunoichi began to notice that Sakura was slowly opening her eyes, and once she did, all she could do is attempt to run away from her stinky fate. But to no avail, Ibuki realizes that her feet are more than just looks, and even more than just kicks. She increased her pressure on poor Sakura's face, keeping her head in place as the schoolgirl noticed that her feet are encased in a pair of shoes for some reason. But they were not the Chucks she always got used to. In fact, it was way different...

"Those are my shoes Sakura. How'd you like it? Cute?" Ibuki asked cutely.

Sakura...
1222311211.title: The smell wakes up Sakura, and...

choices: no. Sakura becomes the cute pink shoes
Just barely. It backfires and Ibuki,  shoes!
12223112111.content:
"I realized if my foot stink is powerful enough to defeat you so easily, there may be some powerful techniques that aren't discovered yet. While you were napping, I did some brainstorming,and I bet you are going to love it as much as I am," Ibuki said with a giggle. Sakura felt a sinking feeling deep inside her, and tried to struggle free again. Unfortunately her earlier convulsions and the lack of clean air had worn her out. Her limbs felt like lead. Ibuki watched her attempts with a giggle, then pinched her nose shut with her rancid toes for a second, "Aww, don't try that. You'll offend my feet, and then you'll have to make it up to them? Maybe with a tongue bath? Or maybe I should have you give one regardless for insulting my beautiful toes?"

Ibuki let out her evil giggle again, and the sinking feeling worsened. Sakura had to get away from these feet. Even if just for a moment. She'd rather be anywhere than here... and that's when she noticed she actually felt like she was sinking. ibuki looked towards her legs for a moment, then giggled again, "That's right, you'd do anything for a clean breath, wouldn't you? Deep down you can't help it. Your spirit will keep trying to get away. And where you spirit goes, you mind will follow, and where it goes your body will follow. And I've only left one escape for it. Can't you feel it in your soul? Or should I say soles?"

Sakura realized what she was saying, and managed to lift her head a little in protest, but Ibuki pushed her back down. She pinched her nose between her toes again, but this time letting just enough stink polluted "Don't be like that. They're new shoes. Why just think, yours are the only feet that have ever been in them. They're probably the ONLY place in here that doesn't smell like my feet. Doesn't that sound like a paradise?" She watched Sakura's eyes start to roll again and gave her a little more air, "Uh uh, no more naps for you. I just need you conscious and focused on getting away from my feet for another 30 seconds. After that you'll be merged with those shoes. Don't worry, I designed the jutsu so you'll last just as long as you would have as a human. You'll even be cute! There's a nice image of your happy face on the outside of each. Of course all your senses will be on the insoles and not the faces, but who cares! Everyone will be jealous of you until I have to dye you for missions. And of course, my feet aren't in the shoes. They're on your helpless human face. Just think, 30 seconds and my feet wont be on you, isn't that great?"

The obviously terrible argument is swaying Sakura's oxygen starved, stink addled brain "Oh man that sounds so good, a nice deep breath of air away from feet. Lemme go I need that so b-NO, I can't, then ill be stuck with the stink forever, but I'll have a minute of clear thought I can use that to escape or just enjoy oh MAN I want that fresh air..."

Does Sakura's will hold out?
12223112111.title: Hears why she made her wear Ibuki's shoes

choices: Make her feet even stinkier so as to torture Sakura even more
Show some mercy and only wear Sakura on special occasions

At the last minute, Sakura's will breaks and she begins to merge with Ibuki's shoes. "This is great! I'll be able to wear you everyday!" Ibuki said happily.
"I lost... I'm going to be under Ibuki's stinky ninja feet for the rest of my life...," Sakura thought to herself as she finished merging with Ibuki's pink shoes.
"I guess I should put you on now," Ibuki said as she put her stinky barefeet into the shoes that Sakura merged with and her foot stink filled Sakura's nose in the insoles.

Now that Sakura has merged with Ibuki's shoes, Ibuki decides to...

a locker full of footwear from Ibuki and the ninja village inhabitants

Sakura began to realize that not only did Ibuki guarantee her permanent foot odor, but she also tried to struggle away from the torture befallen upon her, a decision the schoolgirl would soon regret.

"I see you don't want to give up, eh? Well then..." Ibuki said as she began to cross Sakura's neck with her legs, with a foot covering her face. Sakura realized that she might be experiencing a much more distressing torture, so she tried to fight back and prevent herself from being knocked out again, but to no avail. But unfortunately, her senses were not that strong as the pressure Ibuki had on her neck and the smell of her foot was too much, and proceeded to pass out, again.

Later...

Sakura woke up once again, also realizing that she was tied up once again inside an undisclosed establishment, and standing in front of her are Ibuki (back in full kunoichi garb) and, for some reason, a locker.

"My my, little Sakura-chan, I see you're back awake. I realized that maybe you needed something else to prove a point to you, so instead of dealing with my feet for a while, I brought this locker. Do you know what's inside?"

Sakura got worried hearing the answer based on the torture she just went through, as she would realize it is...
12223112112.title: Prelude to a worse punishment

choices: To make her smell Chun-Li's boots first
To make her smell Cammy's boots first
122231121121.content:
Ibuki opened the locker, shocking Sakura with not only the sight, but more importantly, the plethora of smells that came out of the locker, and immediately hit her like a brick!

"Sakura-chan, over the years of fighting, I've managed to collect a lot of footwear from the most powerful of street fighters. I always knew some day, being a ninja, that this is going to work as an effective torture device. And you, Sakura-chan, will be the first to try this out!"

Sakura began to try and escape her perdicament, but she is still tied up and could not do anything. Ibuki remedied that by placing her toes once again on her nose, causing Sakura to experience what she now considers as the worst foot odor she has ever encountered. And this is considering Sakura wears Chucks everyday!

"Wait wait wait, don't you go anywhere! Unless you want to smell my feet even further and make you drink my foot sweat, would you?" Ibuki said as Sakura thought twice now and instead tried to calm down like a good girl.

"Good Sakura-chan. Now, where do we begin...?" Ibuki asked as she began to rummage through the tons of street fighter footwear inside the locker. There were so many known articles there, from Chun-Li and Cammy's boots to Rose's pumps. And they certainly did not smell like roses. Even Ibuki's school shoes and Sakura's extra pair of Chucks were there!

Ibuki decided...
122231121121.title: A locker full of socks, stockings, and footwear...

choices: Sakura doesn't want, and Ibuki quickly finds a way to punish her
Sakura surprisingly behaves and starts smelling on her own
1222311211211.content:
Ibuki suddenly stopped her search as her gaze fell on one particularly smelly pair of footwear: Chun-Li's high, white boots! Ibuki grinned widely and took them out of the locker immediatly, simply moving them a bit closer to her head made the powerful, cheesy aroma of unwashed feet quite noticeable.

"Ahhhh, yes... Chun-Li's boots... I'm sure you know her, Sakura! The self-proclaimed "strongest woman in the world"... Well, I showed her! But to be honest, I've had my eyes on her boots for a while. Every time I saw her fighting, she was wearing them! It took me quite some time to finally get my hands on them! Hehe, thinking about it, you're really lucky because I've just claimed them yesterday! They are pretty much as fresh as they can get! Lemme try them for you..."

Ibuki carefully moved her face a bit closer to the opening of one of the white, threatening boots. It looked as dangerous and repulsive as the entrance to hell itself, and the air that steadily streamed out of it wasn't different: Hot, humid and sharp. Ibuki took a small whiff and was instantly overwhelmed, the stench hadn't worn off in the slightest!

It was so bad, a sharp and cheesy smell, that Ibuki instinctively turned her head to the side and away from the stinky boot. She giggled a little as she thought how Sakura wouldn't get the chance to do escape them, no matter how hard she would try, Ibuki wouldn't let her.

Turning to her victim again, Ibuki said "Whew, they actually smell just as bad as when I pulled them off! That actually caught me off-guard... You know, I've heard rumors about Chun-Li having incredibly sweaty and smelly feet, even for someone who spends most of her time fighting... And yeah, yesterday, I got to see that for myself! Also, to smell it, hehe! But I should probably shut up now and finally let you experience this fine smell for yourself!"

Ibuki couldn't help but laugh as she saw the horrified look on Sakura's face! She moved the opening of the boot slowly towards Sakura's face, enjoying every moment of terror she was inflicting on her unfortunate victim before she suddenly slammed it quickly against Sakura's face, trapping her nose and mouth completely in the dark, reeking dephs of Chun-Li's well-worn boot!

Sakura was surprised and couldn't help but take a sniff... One that she instantly regretted! Her nose only gathered tainted air, rich with the thick, heavy stench of unwashed, sweaty feet! Even though Sakura didn't take another breath right away, the smell was so strong that tears were streaming from her eyes and she started to cough violently!

Ibuki grinned sadistically, but suddenly, Sakura thrashed around wildly and her mouth came free, which she quickly used to breath in as much relatively clean air as she could.

"Hey! Stop that, you're trying to escape the smell again! I will make you smell those boots, if you want to, or not!"
1222311211211.title: Chun-Li's boots

choices: Sakura complies and tries to bear with the boot
A night in Ibuki's Locker of Justice!
12223112112111.content:
Sakura clearly wants nothing to do with any form of foot odor for the rest of her life after having to go through all the torture Ibuki has put her through, and Chun Li's boots were the last thing on her mind right now.

"Please Ibuki... stop... it... *cough cough*" Sakura could only cough as her senses continue to be depleted thanks to the torture.

"Sakura-chan, don't you like foot odor? Well.. in that case... I have some ways to convince you otherwise." Ibuki slyly said, seeing Sakura gaze her eyes in terror even further.

Ibuki began to open the locker full of the stinky, discarded footwear and gave Sakura an ultimatum that would otherwise put her in her place.

"It's like this, if you smell her boots and follow what I say, then everything will be fine for you. If you don't want to listen to me, then I have no choice than to put you in 'Ibuki's Locker of Justice!'. And what happens inside, and to your willpower, is all under your responsibility. What do you say, sniff the boots, or a night inside the locker?"

Sakura shivered in terror even more. It was either willingly smell Chun Li's boots, or a night in the foot odor locker?
12223112112111.title: Ibuki's Ultimatum

choices: ...Ibuki opens the locker after hours of training.
...Ibuki forgets about Sakura and she spends another 24 hours in the locker.
122231121121112.content:
The stink from Chun Li's boots made Sakura buck and twitch slightly, even though her strength was dwindling. She summoned some control "No...*cough*...I won't." Sakura said, she couldn't take anymore foot smell. Ibuki raised an eyebrow with a smirk, she always wanted to put someone in her locker, but no one had ever taken up on her offer. She tossed the boot back into the locker.

"We'll see what attitude you have after this I warned you! but I guess I have nooo choice but to sentence you to a night in my Locker of Justice!" Ibuki ordered gleefully. Sakura cringed in fear as Ibuki pushed her further into the locker, the sharp smell made her eyes water and her nose hurt. Ibuki then stopped and pulled her out. Sakura didn't understand. Ibuki slapped her forehead "Silly me!" she exclaimed " I almost forgot!" She then stuffed Sakura's mouth with sweaty socks, and bound them to her face with foot wraps that pressed against her upper lip, forcing her to breathe in the stink wafting from them. She then got shoved into the locker. "Have a good night!" Ibuki wished, blowing a kiss. Ibuki closed the door and left Sakura to her fate.

Sakura could barely see, but unfortunately her sense of smell was working just fine that night. At first she just sat, limbs bound on top of the pile, she could feel the warmth the footwear emanated, and the cheesy fumes rose up and filled her lungs. Her body became limp and she took noseful after noseful of mind destroying funk for the first hour of the night. After that, she felt an anger burn inside her, she defied her aching body and began to thrash violently, so focused on her pitiful escape Sakura didn't realize she was only making her sink further into the pile until she sank to the bottom. Only the top of her head could be seen. Socks and hose pressed against every inch of her skin, coating her in slimy sweat. Her face was in a particularly unfortunate place, Decapre's, Cammy's and Chun Li's boots surrounded her face. The opening of six boots constantly venting stench into Sakura's nose, at one point one of Rose's pumps fell and dangled on her nose.

This crippled any resistance she could muster, she spent the rest of the night sniffing and sniffing, unable to fall asleep. The next day...
122231121121112.title: A night in Ibuki's Locker of Justice!

choices: Ibuki came back, and has a new smelling puniishment for Sakura
Ibuki came back with a friend
1222311211211122.content:
Sakura woke up the next day, thinking she would finally have the chance to breathe in some amount of fresh air. Hopeful that things are going to be different from before, Sakura screamed, "Ibuki! It's already morning! Get me out of here!"

But alas, Sakura's screams were not heard. Nothing was happening, no opening of the lockers, no cheerful voice from the stinky footed kunoichi, nothing. Instead, all she was reminded of is the fact that she can still smell all of the bad odors coming from the footwears of other Street Fighters. Sakura tried to get out forcefully, but ended up having one of Juri's foot supporters on her nose, still stinking like before. A partciularly red shoe also ended up on his face, one that seemed to be more than familiar to her...

"Ugh, Karin's shoe. So stinky!"

She knew Karin to be her eternal rival, but for a girl like her, she never knew to be the kind to have stinky feet. But here she was, smelling the stinky shoe of Karin while all the other sources of foot odor mixed in, creating a symphony of suffering for the high schooler with spunk. Sakura was groaning, hungry, and suffering all at the same time, with only foot odor being cosumed by Sakura's poor nose.

The next day...
1222311211211122.title: 24 Hours of Suffering

choices: "Get out here, I need a footrub!"

1521.content:
“Ah that was a great workout.” Misao said to herself. She had just finished her ninja training for the day and was ready to take a nice cool bath when she ran into Yahiko who was looking for her.

“Hey pipsqueak what’s up?” She asked him.

“I want a rematch!” He demanded.

Misao laughed. When he had first come to visit her in Kyoto, the two of them had sparred and she had beaten him. Ever since then the young swordsman had been after her for a rematch. Probably the easiest thing to do would have been to give him one but it was so much more fun to tease him.

Acting like fighting him was the most boring thing in the world, the ninja girl feigned a yawn. “Not interested.”

“C’mon Misao. You got lucky last time.” He complained

“Forget it shorty! I have better things to do than waste my time playfighting with kids.”

That annoyed him even more because he had taken their match seriously. Truth be told so had she but she wasn’t about to let him know that. “You’re not that much older then me.” He argued upset.

“But I am infinitely more skilled and way cooler,” She said. “Now run along and go find someone your own age to play with runt.”

“Flat-chested weasel girl” he grumbled.

“What was that?” Misao snapped.

Yahiko wiped his brow under her smoldering stare. “Nothing.”

The ninja girl glared at Yahiko but suddenly she thought of all the training she had been doing and thought of a good way to get back at him. Lightening up she flashed the boy a smile. “Fine, I’ll fight you but I want you to suffer a penalty if you lose.” Misao told him.

“What do you have in mind?”

“Loser has to do whatever the winner wants for the day!” She said.

“Oh it is so on!” Yahiko agreed.

The two of them walked into the woods for their battle. When they were both ready Yahiko charged Misao with his wooden sword. Moving like lightning, the ninja girl dodged spinning to the right and extended her foot tripping the boy and causing him to stumble. As Yahiko recovered pushing himself off the ground, Misao jumped on his back wrapping her sexy legs around his neck. Twisting her body, she threw him to the side banging him on the ground and keeping him locked in a scissor hold. Smiling, she asked Yahiko if he gave up. Yahiko refused and continued to struggle but he couldn’t break free. The ninja girls legs were just too strong. Giggling Misao tightened her hold literally putting pressure on him to concede defeat. Eventually the pressure proved too much and the swordsman tapped out.

“I-I give.” The boy wheezed.

Misao smirked and loosened her legs on his neck. “I’m sorry. I didn’t get that” She laughed. She gives him a playful squeeze with her legs causing him to gasp before she allows him to answer.

“I give up.”

The Kunoichi grinned. “Thought so,” she releases Yahiko and begins to take off her footwear exposing her cute bare feet as the boy catches her breath. She wiggled her toes slightly as the cool air touched her feet. It felt good to have her footwear off. The combination of tabi socks, ninja sandals and foot wraps really made her feet hot and sweaty which was perfect for what she had in mind. Looking at Yahiko, she grinned. Flat chested weasel girl huh? It’s really going to be very fun humiliating him she thought to herself. Picking up her footwear, she walks in front of the swordsman and tilts his chin up. “Ready to pay up pipsqueak?” She asked.

What happen now?

When the poor girl came too, her head was still in pain and her vision blurry.
